name: Lion Goodman
offering: Business Consulting, Coach Certification, Coach Marketing Training, Coach Promotion, Life Coaching Certification, Mastermind Groups
what_you_do: The Think Unbroken Podcast focuses on healing and transformation from childhood trauma, narcissistic abuse, PTSD, and various mental health challenges through insightful discussions and expert interviews.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking to overcome trauma and improve their mental health, including those dealing with PTSD, CPTSD, and anxiety.
signature_programs: Think Unbroken: Understanding and Overcoming Childhood Trauma, Think Unbroken Trauma Transformation Course
current_projects: Free Think Unbroken Community, downloadable chapters of the book, Trauma Transformation Course
bio: Award-winning book, featured guests include therapists and trauma coaches.
business_focus: The Think Unbroken Podcast focuses on healing and transformation from childhood trauma, narcissistic abuse, PTSD, and various mental health challenges through insightful discussions and expert interviews.
